GSD.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.15.66
GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: Don't finalize CSA in IBSS mode if state is disconnected

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.66 by commit 552ba102a6898630a7d16887f29e606d6fabe508, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit cd7760e62c2ac8581f050b2d36501d1a60beaf83. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: mac80211: Don't finalize CSA in IBSS mode if state is disconnected
